svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
Dec 20, 2020" date: "2020-12-20"
Eth News and Links
Eth1
* 1559 update : more testing, tx pool management fine. 1559 Mainnet checklist
* Latest 1559 implementation call . Beiko’s notes
* Alexandria state network update - full header chain available in Jan
Proof of Stake
* Latest eth2 call . Notes from Mamy and Ben . Early planning for q1/q2 2021 fork, to
shift some accounting to mid-epoch and add light clients
* This week, we crossed 1 billion USD worth of ETH in the deposit contract (no link)
Layer 2
* Optimism testnet adds fraud proofs , with a 3.2 eth bounty for anyone who finds their
fraudulent transaction
This newsletter is made possible thanks to Celer !
We are excited to announce that Phase One of the Celer State Guardian Network (SGN)
mainnet is now up and running! You can stake $CELR and earn state guarding rewards now
with more than 35% block and fee annual reward. Real money games, such as Arcade Win
and Daub Cash , built using Celer as the foundational technology, have hosted more than
12 million games in the last year and processed 30million transactions using Celer's
layer-2 infrastructure.
Follow us on twitter , blog , discord and telegram .
Stuff for developers
* Solidity v0.8 , say goodbye to SafeMath, internal errors will revert instead of
invalid
* Solidity 0.7.6 , better support for calldata types, fallback function can return data
* ethersjs is now equally as used as web3js
* MyCrypto’s testnet faucet - Kovan, Rinkeby, Ropsten, Goerli
* TheGraph launches on mainnet for decentralized indexing, subgraphs will begin
migrating to decentralized in 2021
Security and incidents
* Slither v0.7 , adds 26 detectors including what would have caught last week’s Aave
bug , plus support for Solidity top level objects Neat: run the Aave exploit in a
Hardhat repo
* Neat: run the Aave exploit in a Hardhat repo
* Warp Finance (something I’d never heard of until it got attacked) got attacked for
6.8m in DAI/USDC (plus 1400 ETH) by swapping nearly 200m on Uniswap and 50m on dydx
which depegged the price of WETH. Warp managed to get ~75% back of the DAI/USDC
Ecosystem
* OpenGrants : long-term incentives for open source through streaming payments. First
grant is 3600 ETH for Eth2 development
* Money movers : compare value moved by ETH vs other blockchains
* Sassal’s Eth now vs eth then . Comparing stats of when ETH first crossed $500 and
where it is now.
Enterprise
* Microsoft DRAM/SSD orders, shipments, and assets track and trace for Azure using
private chain built on Quorum
* EY and Microsoft expand XBox’s royalty management to be end-to-end . Also on a
private Quorum chain
Application layer
* Tornado.cash now incentivizing deposits to increase privacy (“the anonymity set”)
through a token. Plus airdrop for early users
* USM “minimalist stablecoin ” on mainnet, though in size-limited “baby form”
* Beeple makes 3.5m USD in last weekend’s cryptoart sale
* Sorare signs up Real Madrid and Gerard Piqué in the same week
* Defi777 is on mainnet. Wrap your erc20 tokens so you don’t have to approve and then
you can interact with protocols by sending to an ENS name
* Treum’s Swether - design your Christmas sweater NFT (plus free sweatshirt with that
logo if in US)
Regulation/business/tokens
* CME announced ETH futures to launch Feb 8. Cash settled, 1 contract = 50 ETH
* CFTC releases Digital Assets Primer
* Germany legalizes securities on chain
* Mnuchin’s ill-considered midnight rulemaking proposal on crypto addresses
* Coinbase submits S-1 to begin IPO process
General
* Halo Infinite , any additive polynomial commitment scheme
* Prover time comparison of GKR+Groth16 vs. Groth16 for proving MiMC hashes
* Compound announces PoA appchain plans; governed by COMP, with a collateralized
stablecoin as the unit for paying fees.
* Multiple US federal agencies compromised in attack on SolarWind . The feds are
blaming Russian state action
* Deleting Google’s malware to 10x your machine’s performance : Chrome (and Keystone)
Job Listings
* Passionate about DeFi? Join us and drive BD at mStable
* SigmaPrime is hiring a blockchain security engineer
* 0x looking for devs of all types and a Matcha marketing manager
* Chainlink Labs is looking for a DevOps Engineer (Monitoring)
* Nexus Mutual: experienced Solidity dev in Euro timezones
Want your job listing here ? $250 per line (~75 character limit including spaces),
payable in ETH (or 250 DAI or 250 USDC) to evan.ethereum.eth. Questions?
thecryptonewspodcast at-gmail
If you’re wondering “ why didn’t my post make it into Week in Ethereum News ,” then
please put it on an Ethereum subreddit; emails/DMs are not part of my workflow.
Please click the following if you’re interested in sponsoring the newsletter .
Follow the newsletter on twitter: @WeekinEthNews
Permalink for this week’s issue:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-dec-20-2020/
Dates of Note
Upcoming dates of note ( new/changes in bold ) :
* Dec 22 - Deadline to apply for proof of stake community grants
* Jan 15 - Feb 7 - ETHGlobal’s Market Make hackathon
* Feb 5-12 - ETHDenver (virtual)
* Apr 6-8 - EthCC4 (Paris)
Did you get forwarded this newsletter? Sign up to receive it weekly
Week in Ethereum News
